attributes.comment:
Though I believe that illegal immigration needs to be stopped and families
constantly entering the US limited the adoption of effected children in poor
countrys needs to continue. The raising of fees for these adoptions making it
harder for those who are willing to take a child and raise them is not right. I am
talking specifically about the I-600, the N-600 and the Certificate of Citizenship for
IR-4 children bills. Do not increase these fees. Let tax paying responsible
citizens have the opportunity to have a child in their home.

Comment on FR Doc # E7-01631
attributes.title: Comment Submitted by Morrow
